story.line2: Is this piece of junk really working?

story.line1: OMG. Don't believe this junk is working.
story.line2: Sry. My name is Ashley. Who are You? WHERE are you?
story.optionOneTextline1: I'm just a normal person at home.
story.optionOneTextline2: And what is this junk your talking about?
story.optionTwoTextline1: Sry. don't give my real name on the net.

story.line1: I just found an old smartphone here.
Oh Shit... I think I heard a motorcycle!
story.line2: Shit... Shit... it can be a RIKER! I'm fucked!!!

story.line1: I'm still here. There a fuss outside. I think It's a gang of Rikers...
story.line2: I... I don't know what to do!!!

story.line1: Rikers are really bad people. If they cath me... I...
story.line2: I don't even dare to think what will be of me.
story.optionOneTextline1: So get out of there FAST!!!
story.optionTwoTextline1: If they are so danger as you say...
story.optionTwoTextline2: Just call the cops and hide and be as quiet like a dead.

story.optionOneTextline2: Are you ok? plz talk to me!!
story.optionTwoTextline2: Don't make fun with things like this...

story.line1: I'm here. Sorry for the delay to response. I couldn't run out.
story.line2: My legs started to shake and I hide. Maybe for the best. I hear some terryfying sounds outside.
